fields.name: Screen_ValidateCreation_CheckboxGroup2
fields.fieldText: Send the Credit Note to the Customer automatically ?

fields.name: Screen_ValidateCreation_Manual_DisplayText_Cancellation
fields.fieldText: First create the credit note in the designated system and report here its third party number.

fields.name: Screen_ValidateCreation_Manual_DisplayText
fields.fieldText:
This Customer Request is not eligible to the automatic process.

First create the credit note in the designated system and report here its third party number.

fields.name: Screen_ValidateCreation_Manual_DisplayText_Bis
fields.fieldText:
You chose to create the credit note manually.

First create the credit note in the designated system and report here its third party number.

fields.name: Screen_ValidateCreation_Auto_MultiInvoice
fields.fieldText:
This Customer Request could not be processed automatically because it is related to more than one invoice..

First create the credit note in the designated system and report here its third party number.
